0.0.5.en:
Limited size of log.
Results of device search now added to 'Detected' tab of app configuration.
Fixed Contact Sensor problem

0.0.8.en:
Fixed premature exit from capability processing loop if an error occurs
Added set functions for temperature, mode and optional mode
Fixed name error in capability lookup table (WIP)

0.0.9.en: Added more AC controls and flow cards (WIP)

0.0.14.en: Added energy meter and motion sensor

0.0.15.en: Split SmartThings Components into separate devices (WIP)

0.0.16.en: Added an option to send commands to SmartThings for diagnostics use (WIP)

0.0.17.en:
Added support for blinds.
Fixed issue with saving the Bearer Token so a restart is no longer required.
Re-enabled option to add multiple device at the same time.

0.0.19.en: Added new driver for refrigeration as it is too complex for a generic approach.

0.0.20.en: Change class name from TV to tv.

0.0.21.en: Fixed Volume up button and suppressed warning messages in the log about write only capabilities.

0.0.22.en: Fixed AC Windfree flow action card.

0.0.26.en: Breaking change: capability name changed so the alarm icon shows when the door is open. Added condition flow card for Garage Door.

0.0.27.en: Added action cards for Washing Machine flows. Fixed Washer Mode capability.

0.0.29.en:
Added water alarm capability
Added Accelerometer capabilities.

1.0.0.en:
Added water alarm capability
Added Accelerometer capabilities.

1.0.1.en:
Better log entry clarifications.
Safeguard against interleaved polling and setting of values.

1.0.6.en: Added support for setting Dryer Cycle

1.0.8.en: Added priorities to class types to ensure a lock gets the Locked indicator on the tile

1.0.9.en: Added Media Input Source as a status value

1.0.10.en:
Added option to set Media Input Source.
Added samsungvd.soundFrom as a status

1.0.11.en:
Fix Media Input Source.
Added flow action for media input source.
Removed samsungvd.soundFrom

1.0.13.en: Fix Washer Status flow and added support for washer mode with Table_02.

1.0.15.en: Fix Dryer Status Changed flow trigger.

1.0.16.en:
Fix Dim for bulb.
Added Colour and Temperature to RGB / RGBW bulbs.

1.0.18.en:
Add button time stamp
Added Send Log buttons to detected devices and Information Log.

1.0.19.en: Added button pressed flow trigger card.

1.0.20.en: Added checks for valid data when processing device list. Log devices special status during device list processing.
